thumb.title: NITORI３
thumb.description: [Verse] Stacking shelves building dreams shadows bite the light Cracks in the walls whisper talk quiet dead of night Forklift beasts scream and moan heavy wheels they roll Echoes of futures made haunted by a soul [Verse 2] Flatpacks raining from the sky neon burns the floor Every box a puzzle piece asking always more Clash of colors chaos hum fabrics in the air Sweat and screws and splinters stain hopes laid threadbare [Chorus]ニトリ ニトリ who am I in this shrine Amid chairs and lights lost in a straight-line design Build me a universe from a bargain price sign Fill the void fill the void let me cross this thin line [Verse 3] Leather sofas creak and shout holding stories deep Mattress mountains cradle fear while the weary sleep Cheap plastic tables bend laugh but they don’t break Made to serve made to hold all the lives we fake [Bridge]Endless aisles stretch their veins lost in lightbulb glow Dreams reduced to dollar signs on this endless show The harmony you promise rings hollow it’s gray ニトリ tell me tell me what the price we pay [Chorus] ニトリ ニトリ who am I in this shrine Amid chairs and lights lost in a straight-line design Build me a universe from a bargain price sign Fill the ～
